comments.content:
Should be [Blah](http://web.archive.org/web/20150113011425/http:/experimentalsans.tumblr.com/post/21848688657/graphic-blah-http-studiolin-org-blah), (exclusive?) typeface by [Benjamin Critton](http://web.archive.org/web/20150113011425/http:/www.benjamincritton.com/) for Sight Unseen Paper View designed (Studio) Andrew Lin.  
A similar: [BarQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20150113011425/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typesgal/barq), [Simon Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150113011425/http:/www.tendollarfonts.com/simon-sans-typeface)
